attributes.action: Policy for teachers to report to their nearest school in inclement weather
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, wish the Government to implement as policy for teachers to report to their nearest school when the weather is snowy if they are unable to reach their usual place of work. Thus enabling more schools to remain open and consequently having less detrimental effect on the education of children by having fewer school closures
